alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kenedy; Inland Kenedy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 6:16AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Kenedy County through 700 AM CDT... At 615 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Armstrong, moving east around 10 to 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Armstrong, Norias, U S 77 Border Patrol Station and Armstrong Ranch Airport. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 724 and 744. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
